source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

spells.description: Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that summons a Storm Elemental for 7.2 sec. Casting Ascendance always hits a Jackpot!
Set: When you summon or extend your Storm Elemental, your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, and Lava Burst deal 30% increased damage for 8 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Look through the lens and randomly scale up or down, gaining 7,944 Critical Strike or Haste for 15 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Use: Summon a Bursting Lightspawn which sacrifices its health to unleash Bursts of Light, inflicting 853,607 Holy damage split between nearby enemies every 2 sec while it lives. (2 Min Cooldown)
